table.name: vtiger_jobalerts
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_jobalerts` ( `jobalertsid` int(11) NOT NULL, `alerttime` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `modulename` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `moduleid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `alertcontent` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `alertid` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `alertfrequency` int(11) DEFAULT '30', `alertstatus` varchar(50) DEFAULT 'wait', `alertcount` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `finishtime` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `remark` text, PRIMARY KEY (`jobalertsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
